text: Peter Brian Westerway (27 February 1931 - 26 May 2015) was an Australian public servant and Labor Party official. Westerway, whose background was in television, was elected secretary of the New South Wales branch of the Labor Party in 1969, with the support of the right-wing faction. He later served as chairman of the Australian Broadcasting Tribunal from 1991 to 1995. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Australian public servants
title: Peter Westerway
